summary:
New dungeon under Breezehome ,also 3 new spells my first mod ever im going to add 40 spells but i just released it so ya i hope you like it :) !
please alcheastbreach do this mod showcase
descriptionHtml:
New dungeon under Breezehome ,also 15 new spells my first mod ever im going to add 40 spells but i just released it so ya i hope you like it :) !
please alcheastbreach do this mod showcase


so i added 15 out of 40 spells here are the spells

inferno is a giant gout of fire that dose 100 dam per sec and takes 59 magica per second


ExtremeCold is a gout of frost that dose 100 dam per sec and takes 59 magica per second



WindBlast is a gout of wind that takes 29 magica per sec and dose whata fus ro dah dose except a little bit stronger

speed up makes you go twice as fast

recharge weapon recharges your weapons enchantment level

night eye is self explanatory

conjure dragon 

conjure dragon priest

conjure draugr

conjure troll

conjure werewolf

conjure redwolf

conjure pet chicken

conjure spriggan

conjure skeleton

also i added a new quest 

show case = http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sXQ5Ffm7IwI
author: dsdsds123100
